brand_identity.name: QRPlanet Clone
brand_identity.mission: To make QR code generation and tracking simple, beautiful, and powerful for everyone.

usage.h1: font-heading font-bold text-5xl md:text-7xl tracking-tight leading-[1.1]

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Outfit:wght@300;400;500;600;700;800&family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@400;500;600;700&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&display=swap');

usage_rules: Use Primary (Indigo/Violet) for main CTAs and active states.
Use Secondary (Pale Blue/Gray) for background accents and secondary buttons.
Avoid pure black; use deep slate/navy for text.
Gradients: Use subtle mesh gradients for backgrounds, NOT for text.

grid_systems.marketing: Bento Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-6. Use col-span-4, col-span-6, col-span-8 for asymmetry.
grid_systems.dashboard: Dense Grid: grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4. Sidebar fixed width (250px) + Main Content fluid.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: npm install framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot lucide-react recharts sonner
SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and fonts defined above.
SETUP: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css.
LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the landing page features section.
COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'rounded-full' button style and 'rounded-xl' card style.
THEME: Default to Light Mode for the landing page, but support Dark Mode for the dashboard.
NAVIGATION: Create a sticky glassmorphic header.
QR GENERATOR: Make the QR preview sticky on the right side while the user edits the form on the left (on desktop).
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (p-8, p-12).
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Do not use 'Inter' font for headings. Use 'Outfit'.
Avoid full-screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients or noise textures.
